name: Terry-fied
description: Terry-fied is an action adventure game made during Chillennium 2019 where you play as Terry ,the goal is to turn everyone else into Terry. By using the WASD keys the player traverses the map and chases after the AI to assimilate them into the one that is Terry. You achieve Terry’s goal  by filling up the vial on the right side of the screen, which only rises once another AI as been turned into Terry. It’s all for one and one for all, as all must become the one known as Terry Midas.
